library(readxl)
library(fpp)
library(fpp2)

file_path <- "D://SEM_1//BF//dataset_assign.xlsx"
data<-read_excel(file_path)

datats<- ts(data$Monthlybeerproduction, start=c(1956,1), frequency=12)
plot(datats)
acf(datats)
stl_decomp <- stl(datats,s.window ="periodic")
plot(stl_decomp)
attributes(stl_decomp)

decomposition<-decompose(datats)
plot(decomposition)

plot(datats)
lines(seasadj(stl_decomp), col='Red')
f_stl<-forecast(stl_decomp)
plot(f_stl)
